data.Name: Bankers test
data.Description: A productivity test to demonstrate to investors there is adequate economic potential.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Buildup test
data.Description: The well is produced at a constant flow rate until pressure is stabilized, then shut in and record the buildup in pressure over time.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Drawdown test
data.Description: During production the flow rate is held approximately constant while the well pressure is measured.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Drill stem test
data.Description: A flow test performed after drilling an exploration well or prior to a completion decision, using a special test assembly and the drill string as the fluid pathway.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Flow test
data.Description: General classification of flow test not covered by any of the specified test types.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Formation test
data.Description: Gathering data on a formation to measure its projected and expected productivity, usually before installing casing.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Initial Potential test
data.Description: A flow test to determine the maximum rate at which a well can produce or inject fluids when it is first completed.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Injection flow test
data.Description: Measures the mobility of injected fluids based on rate and pressure.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Interference test
data.Description: A flow test involving a primary well and observation wells in a reservoir to improve estimates of directional permeability and reservoir storativity.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Multirate test
data.Description: A flow test performed at varying flow rates, by adjusting choke sizes to determine gas well deliverability and absolute open flow potential (AOF)
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Production test
data.Description: A flow test at any time during the life of a producing well to monitor reservoir performance and identify any potential problems.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Swab test
data.Description: Fluid flow into the wellbore is induced by a temporary drop in pressure at the wellbore interval using a special wellbore tool.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Wireline formation test
data.Description: A test for pressure equilibrium conducted by a wireline device.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).
